name: Aurlabcvsimulator
body:
### Welcome to Aurlabcvsimulator.
Hi, I hope you find this project interesting!

### Contributing
You are welcome to continue to develop this simulator and add different methods to improve obstacle avoidance. 
Things that would be cool to add:
- automatic scene interpretation
- anchor
- object recognition
- egometry from motion

### Authors and Contributors
In the spring of 2016, Lars Brusletto (@larssbr) wrote his master thesis: Computer Vision based Obstacle Avoidance for an ROV.
This is a bi-product of that work. He needed a simulator to test the feasibility of different obstacle avoidance algorithms. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Aurlabcvsimulator? Check out the documentation at http://aurlabcvsimulator.readthedocs.io/ or contact support at (https://github.com/larssbr) or larsbrusletto@gmail.com and I will help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
